cardName.name: Arha Sanctuary
cardName.text:
When this enters play, put the top card of your deck under this face up. Once per turn, you may swap a card in your hand for the card under Arha Sanctuary.
When Arha Sanctuary leaves play or the game ends, put the card under it into your discard pile.

cardName.name: Elder Skeptic
